name: Meticulous
headline: Automated e2e screenshot testing without writing or maintaining tests
description:
Meticulous is a tool to automatically catch UI bugs in your web application with zero-effort. Install our JavaScript snippet onto production or staging and dev environments, which records user sessions by collecting clickstream and network data. When you post a pull request, Meticulous selects a subset of sessions which are relevant and simulates these against the frontend of your application. Meticulous takes screenshots at key points and detects any visual differences. It posts those diffs in a comment for you to inspect in a few seconds. 

This eliminates the setup and maintenance burden of UI testing.

founders.name: Gabriel Spencer-Harper, Founder
founders.description:
Working on software to catch bugs in web applications with zero-effort from developers. 

I used to be a software engineer at Opendoor and Dropbox.

## Testing at a new level of robustness
01.
### Meticulous monitors your daily interactions with your application as you develop it
Add a script tag to your local development, staging, and preview URL environments to record sessions. Optional: record production sessions too for additional coverage.
[Learn More![Arrow Orange](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6549fed2a4d9c7dcc4bdbff8_arrow-orange.svg)![Arrow Lite](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6549fed18294cf1406100130_arrow-liteorange.svg)](https://www.meticulous.ai/</how-it-works>)
![Step 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/65325bde66473a1833e21a44_step-monitors.png)
02.
### Our AI engine generates a continuously evolving test suite that covers every corner of your application
By tracking the code branches executed by each interaction Meticulous curates a suite of visual end-to-end tests that cover of every line of your codebase. Every user flow. Every edge-case.
[Learn More![Arrow Orange](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6549fed2a4d9c7dcc4bdbff8_arrow-orange.svg)![Arrow Lite](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6549fed18294cf1406100130_arrow-liteorange.svg)](https://www.meticulous.ai/</how-it-works>)
![Step 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/65325bdd5a83ce150ae170db_step-code-coverage.png)
03.
### Open a pull request, and see the impact it will have across user workflows before you hit merge
By default Meticulous mocks out the responses from your backend by saving and replaying the original recorded responses - this means side-effect free tests with no false positives from changing data, and no need to set up special test accounts or mock test data for each test run. Just add the recorder script, click to install the integration for your CI and you're good to go.
[Learn More![Arrow Orange](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6549fed2a4d9c7dcc4bdbff8_arrow-orange.svg)![Arrow Lite](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6549fed18294cf1406100130_arrow-liteorange.svg)](https://www.meticulous.ai/</how-it-works>)
![Step 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/65325b7c82fc6cc93fd5031d_step-pull-request.png)
### Never write, fix or maintain a test again: your tests automatically evolve as your app evolves.
#### Iterate at velocity
Dramatically increase the speed you can ship reliable regression-free code. Meticulous continually adds new tests as new features or edge cases are introduced, and removes old tests as they become out of date - ensuring your test suite is always up to date and complete, without any intervention required by developers.
![Velocity](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/654879aceecb661f14ec8c54_velocity.png)
![Eliminate](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6538b981ef07b4b8136652e6_eliminate.png)
#### Built to eliminate all flakes, from the ground up
Built from the Chromium level up with a deterministic scheduling engine – making it the only testing tool that eliminates flakes. This technology also allows Meticulous to execute tests at lightning fast speeds. Battle-tested to work with even the most complex applications.
"We trust Meticulous to be the sole front-end testing system for our app. It has caught countless UI bugs and regressions without us having to write a single test. This coverage saves us time and gives us confidence to move quickly."
![WithPower](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6538f40bac3b56ea1569a129_withpower.png)
![Nick Hrynuik](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6538f461625655b5ce8f4165_nick-hrynuik.png)
Nick Hrynuik
Engineer at WithPower
"Within the first two weeks of using Meticulous, our team prevented over five regressions, significantly boosting our engineers' confidence in the codebase quality. The ability to introduce changes without fear of breaking existing functionality has been invaluable."
![Lattice logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/66ffb6cde775d8a879a547d1_lattice-logo-vector.svg)
![Gerald](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/66ffb4d18b941768937b282a_1635897892548.jpg)
Gerald Sornsen
Engineering Manager at Lattice
![Combination](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/6538e0149c99d2a55f889088_combination.png)
#### Use in combination with your existing test suite, or as a replacement
You can use Meticulous to complement any existing tests you have, or replace your existing tests entirely.
#### Lightning fast testing – at scale
Tests are heavily parallelized across a compute cluster, allowing you to test 1000s of screens and get results in under 120 seconds.
![Fast Scale](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/65488531bba4fa0fbdb0c331_fast-scale.png)

## get started by adding the meticulous recorder script tag
[NextJS](https://www.meticulous.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[React](https://www.meticulous.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Vue](https://www.meticulous.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Angular](https://www.meticulous.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Nuxt](https://www.meticulous.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[SvelteKit](https://www.meticulous.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
```
Add to your _document.js <Head> or /app/layout.tsx <head> tag:
{process.env.NODE_ENV === "development" && (
 <script data-project-id="..." src="https://snippet.meticulous.ai/v1/meticulous.js"></script>
)}
[![Copy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/654a32ac1ca7cad9ba7dcee2_copy.svg)](https://www.meticulous.ai/<#>)
```

```
import { tryLoadAndStartRecorder } from '@alwaysmeticulous/recorder-loader'
async function startApp() {
 // Record all sessions on localhost, staging stacks and preview URLs
 if (!isProduction()) {
  await tryLoadAndStartRecorder({  
   projectId: '...',
   isProduction: false,
  });
 }
 
 ReactDOM.render(component, document.getElementById('root'));
}
function isProduction() {
 return window.location.hostname.indexOf("your-production-site.com") > -1;
}
startApp();![Copy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/654a32ac1ca7cad9ba7dcee2_copy.svg)
```

```
import Vue from "vue";
import App from "./App.vue";
import router from "./router";
import store from "./store";
import { tryLoadAndStartRecorder } from '@alwaysmeticulous/recorder-loader';
async function startApp() {
 if (!isProduction()) {
  await tryLoadAndStartRecorder({  
   projectId: '...',
   isProduction: false,
  });
 }
 
 new Vue({ router, store, render: h => h(App)}).$mount("#app");
}
function isProduction() {
 return window.location.hostname.indexOf("your-production-site.com") > -1;
}
startApp();![Copy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/654a32ac1ca7cad9ba7dcee2_copy.svg)
```

```
import { platformBrowserDynamic } from '@angular/platform-browser-dynamic';
  import { AppModule } from './app/app.module';
  import { tryLoadAndStartRecorder } from '@alwaysmeticulous/recorder-loader'
  async function startApp() {
    if (!isProduction()) {
     await tryLoadAndStartRecorder({  
      projectId: '...',
      isProduction: false,
     });
    } 
    
    // Initalise app after the Meticulous recorder is ready, for example:
    platformBrowserDynamic().bootstrapModule(AppModule)
     .catch(err => console.error(err));
  }
  
  function isProduction() {
    return window.location.hostname.indexOf("your-production-site.com") > -1;
  }
  
  startApp();![Copy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/654a32ac1ca7cad9ba7dcee2_copy.svg)
```

```

 head: {
 script: process.env.NODE_ENV === "production" ? [] : [

   ["data-project-id"]: '...',
   ["data-is-production-environment"] false,
  }
  ],
 }
}![Copy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65310f49fd3cda9049c4e065/654a32ac1ca7cad9ba7dcee2_copy.svg)

## Testing at a new level of robustness
01.
### Meticulous monitors your daily interactions with your application as you develop it
Add a script tag to your local development, staging, and preview URL environments to record sessions. Optional: record production sessions too for additional coverage.
Learn More![Arrow Orange⟨22⟩![Arrow Lite⟨23⟩]](https://www.meticulous.ai/</how-it-works>)
![Step 1⟨24⟩]
02.
### Our AI engine generates a continuously evolving test suite that covers every corner of your application
By tracking the code branches executed by each interaction Meticulous curates a suite of visual end-to-end tests that cover of every line of your codebase. Every user flow. Every edge-case.
Learn More![Arrow Orange⟨22⟩![Arrow Lite⟨23⟩]](https://www.meticulous.ai/</how-it-works>)
![Step 2⟨25⟩]
03.
### Open a pull request, and see the impact it will have across user workflows before you hit merge
By default Meticulous mocks out the responses from your backend by saving and replaying the original recorded responses - this means side-effect free tests with no false positives from changing data, and no need to set up special test accounts or mock test data for each test run. Just add the recorder script, click to install the integration for your CI and you're good to go.
Learn More![Arrow Orange⟨22⟩![Arrow Lite⟨23⟩]](https://www.meticulous.ai/</how-it-works>)
![Step 3⟨26⟩]
### Never write, fix or maintain a test again: your tests automatically evolve as your app evolves.
#### Iterate at velocity
Dramatically increase the speed you can ship reliable regression-free code. Meticulous continually adds new tests as new features or edge cases are introduced, and removes old tests as they become out of date - ensuring your test suite is always up to date and complete, without any intervention required by developers.
![Velocity⟨27⟩]
![Eliminate⟨28⟩]
#### Built to eliminate all flakes, from the ground up
Built from the Chromium level up with a deterministic scheduling engine – making it the only testing tool that eliminates flakes. This technology also allows Meticulous to execute tests at lightning fast speeds. Battle-tested to work with even the most complex applications.
"We trust Meticulous to be the sole front-end testing system for our app. It has caught countless UI bugs and regressions without us having to write a single test. This coverage saves us time and gives us confidence to move quickly."
![WithPower⟨29⟩]
![Nick Hrynuik⟨30⟩]
Nick Hrynuik
Engineer at WithPower
"Within the first two weeks of using Meticulous, our team prevented over five regressions, significantly boosting our engineers' confidence in the codebase quality. The ability to introduce changes without fear of breaking existing functionality has been invaluable."
![Lattice logo⟨31⟩]
![Gerald⟨32⟩]
Gerald Sornsen
Engineering Manager at Lattice
![Combination⟨33⟩]
#### Use in combination with your existing test suite, or as a replacement
You can use Meticulous to complement any existing tests you have, or replace your existing tests entirely.
#### Lightning fast testing – at scale
Tests are heavily parallelized across a compute cluster, allowing you to test 1000s of screens and get results in under 120 seconds.
![Fast Scale⟨34⟩]

## get started by adding the meticulous recorder script tag
NextJS⟨56⟩React⟨57⟩Vue⟨58⟩Angular⟨59⟩Nuxt⟨60⟩SvelteKit⟨61⟩
```
Add to your _document.js <Head> or /app/layout.tsx <head> tag:
{process.env.NODE_ENV === "development" && (
 <script data-project-id="..." src="https://snippet.meticulous.ai/v1/meticulous.js"></script>
)}
![Copy⟨62⟩](https://www.meticulous.ai/<#>)
```

```
import { tryLoadAndStartRecorder } from '@alwaysmeticulous/recorder-loader'
async function startApp() {
 // Record all sessions on localhost, staging stacks and preview URLs
 if (!isProduction()) {
  await tryLoadAndStartRecorder({  
   projectId: '...',
   isProduction: false,
  });
 }
 
 ReactDOM.render(component, document.getElementById('root'));
}
function isProduction() {
 return window.location.hostname.indexOf("your-production-site.com") > -1;
}
startApp();![Copy⟨62⟩]
```

```
import Vue from "vue";
import App from "./App.vue";
import router from "./router";
import store from "./store";
import { tryLoadAndStartRecorder } from '@alwaysmeticulous/recorder-loader';
async function startApp() {
 if (!isProduction()) {
  await tryLoadAndStartRecorder({  
   projectId: '...',
   isProduction: false,
  });
 }
 
 new Vue({ router, store, render: h => h(App)}).$mount("#app");
}
function isProduction() {
 return window.location.hostname.indexOf("your-production-site.com") > -1;
}
startApp();![Copy⟨62⟩]
```

```
import { platformBrowserDynamic } from '@angular/platform-browser-dynamic';
  import { AppModule } from './app/app.module';
  import { tryLoadAndStartRecorder } from '@alwaysmeticulous/recorder-loader'
  async function startApp() {
    if (!isProduction()) {
     await tryLoadAndStartRecorder({  
      projectId: '...',
      isProduction: false,
     });
    } 
    
    // Initalise app after the Meticulous recorder is ready, for example:
    platformBrowserDynamic().bootstrapModule(AppModule)
     .catch(err => console.error(err));
  }
  
  function isProduction() {
    return window.location.hostname.indexOf("your-production-site.com") > -1;
  }
  
  startApp();![Copy⟨62⟩]
```

```
{
 head: {
 script: process.env.NODE_ENV === "production" ? [] : [
  {
  src: 'https://snippet.meticulous.ai/v1/meticulous.js',
   ["data-project-id"]: '...',
   ["data-is-production-environment"] false,
  }
  ],
 }
}![Copy⟨62⟩]
```

```
<svelte:head>
{#if !import.meta.env.PROD}
 <script
  data-project-id="..."
  data-is-production-environment="false"
  src="https://snippet.meticulous.ai/v1/meticulous.js"
 ></script> 
 {/if}
<svelte:head>![Copy⟨62⟩]

generated_description:
### Meticulous: Revolutionizing UI Testing

**Overview**

Founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s Batch S21, Meticulous is a London-based startup that’s transforming how we think about user interface (UI) testing. With a compact team of five employees, they've developed a powerful tool designed to automate end-to-end screenshot testing without the cumbersome need to write or maintain tests. You can check them out at [Meticulous AI](https://www.meticulous.ai).

**Mission**

Meticulous aims to eliminate the burden of setup and maintenance associated with traditional UI testing methods. Simply by installing a JavaScript snippet in your production or staging environments, you can start capturing user sessions including clickstream and network data. As developers work and push changes, Meticulous intelligently selects and simulates a representative subset of user sessions. The tool automatically generates screenshots at critical points in user interactions to identify visual discrepancies, enabling teams to catch bugs before they reach production.

**How It Works**

1. **Session Recording**: Add a script tag to start recording sessions wherever your application is being developed.
   
2. **AI-Driven Test Generation**: Meticulous uses advanced AI to create a comprehensive suite of visual tests that cover every nook and cranny of your application. 

3. **Pull Request Impact Analysis**: Before merging a pull request, Meticulous provides detailed insights on how changes will affect user workflows, helping to avoid potential regressions.

4. **Continuous Evolution of Tests**: As your application evolves, so does your test suite. New tests are generated automatically with new features while outdated tests are seamlessly retired, requiring zero intervention from developers.

5. **Speed and Reliability**: Meticulous runs tests in a highly parallelized fashion across a compute cluster, getting results for thousands of screens in less than two minutes. It combats flaky tests by employing deterministic scheduling, ensuring consistency and stability in how tests perform.

**Trusted by Many**

Over 100 organizations already trust Meticulous, including known names like Dropbox and Lattice. Users have praised its capacity to catch UI bugs without the overhead of manual test maintenance, allowing teams to move faster with confidence.

**Conclusion**

Meticulous is positioning itself as a game-changer in the DevTools landscape. With its revolutionary approach to UI testing, it is empowering teams to focus on what really matters—building great products without the logistical headaches of traditional testing. So, if you're looking to elevate your development process, Meticulous offers a compelling solution to enhance productivity and reliability.

Whether you're interested in streamlining your testing process or simply want to ensure bug-free user experiences, Meticulous might just be the tool you've been waiting for.
